comment: * A builder for a ClipData Item.

methods.name: public Builder setText(@Nullable CharSequence text)
methods.comment: * Sets the text for the item to be constructed.

methods.name: public Builder setHtmlText(@Nullable String htmlText)
methods.comment: * Sets the HTML text for the item to be constructed.

methods.name: public Builder setIntent(@Nullable Intent intent)
methods.comment: * Sets the Intent for the item to be constructed.

methods.name: public Builder setIntentSender(@Nullable IntentSender intentSender)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link IntentSender} for the item to be constructed. To prevent receiving
             * apps from improperly manipulating the intent to launch another activity as this
             * caller, the provided IntentSender must be immutable.
             *
             * If there is a fixed lifetime for this ClipData (ie. for drag and drop), the system
             * will cancel the IntentSender when it is no longer used.

methods.name: public Builder setUri(@Nullable Uri uri)
methods.comment: * Sets the URI for the item to be constructed.

methods.name: public Item build()
methods.comment: * Constructs a new Item with the properties set on this builder.
